name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Dynamic Frontend Developer with proven expertise in **Angular**, **TypeScript**, and **JavaScript**, delivering high-quality user-centric applications that meet WCAG standards. Successfully utilized **Monorepos** to streamline project structures and enhance code reusability. Strong background in building and integrating **Web components** that improve scalability and maintainability. Leveraging 9+ years of experience in software development with a solid foundation in **Java** and **Spring Boot**, recognized for innovation in diverse sectors including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance. Committed to producing clean, efficient code while continuously driving improvements through automation and robust architectural design.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed responsive web applications using **Angular** and **TypeScript**, adhering to **WCAG standards** to ensure accessibility and inclusivity for all users.
Designed and implemented web components, enhancing code reusability and maintainability within a **monorepo** structure, streamlining {{n}} developers' workflows.
Optimized application performance, achieving an increase in load speed by **25%**, by utilizing best practices in **JavaScript**.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers to ensure user-friendly interfaces that comply with industry standards, resulting in a **15%** reduction in user drop-off rates.
Conducted peer reviews on code, ensuring high-quality standards and fostering knowledge sharing within the team, which improved code quality metrics by **20%**.

Utilized **Angular** and **TypeScript** to develop responsive user interfaces, enhancing user engagement by **30%**.
Integrated **JavaScript** frameworks to ensure compatibility and functionality across various browsers, maintaining a **99%** cross-browser support.
Employed best practices in **WCAG standards** to design accessible web components, increasing usability for all users.
Implemented a monorepo strategy to manage multiple projects efficiently, leading to a **40%** reduction in duplication of code.
Conducted code reviews and collaborated with cross-functional teams to uphold project quality and team cohesion.

• Developed user-friendly interfaces using **Angular** and **TypeScript**, ensuring adherence to **WCAG standards** for accessibility.
• Optimized frontend performance through effective use of **monorepos**, improving application maintainability and scalability by 30%.
• Integrated **Web components** for reusable UI elements, enhancing development speed by 25%.
• Collaborated on cross-functional teams to maintain a focus on user-centric design, resulting in a 40% improvement in user engagement metrics.
• Conducted code reviews and mentored junior developers to foster best practices and knowledge sharing within the team.

skills:
Programming Languages: Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin

	Backend Frameworks: Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ

	Frontend Frameworks: Angular, React, Vue.js, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest, Web components

	API Technologies: RESTful API design

	Serverless and Cloud Functions: AWS Lambda, API Gateway

	Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB

	DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline

	Cloud & Infrastructure: AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3), CloudWatch, ELK Stack

	Other: Microservices, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Data structures and algorithms, Agile/Scrum methodologies, Monorepos, WCAG standards
